title: What does 'CSS Flex' stand for?

options.a: Computer System Software Flexibility
options.b: Cascading Style Sheets for Flexboxes
options.c: Cascading Style Sheets Flexible Box Layout

title: What is the primary purpose of CSS Flex?

options.a: To create fancy animations
options.b: To provide a layout model for arranging and aligning elements within a container
options.c: To add color and style to web pages

title: What is a 'flex container' in CSS Flex?

options.a: A container for transporting goods
options.b: An element that holds and arranges flex items
options.c: A container for holding liquid

title: What is a 'flex item' in CSS Flex?

options.a: An item in a shopping list
options.b: An element within a flex container that is being laid out according to the flex layout model
options.c: An item on a restaurant menu

title: What does 'main axis' and 'cross axis' refer to in CSS Flex?

options.a: The two main colors used in a design
options.b: The primary and secondary navigation menus of a website
options.c: The two axes used to arrange and align flex items within a flex container

title: What is the default value of 'flex-direction' in CSS Flex?

options.a: row
options.b: column
options.c: column-reverse

title: What does 'justify-content' control in CSS Flex?

options.a: The content of a web page
options.b: The alignment of flex items along the main axis
options.c: The order of elements on a page
options.d: The position of the flex container

title: What is the purpose of 'align-items' in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align images in a gallery
options.b: To control the alignment of flex items along the cross axis
options.c: To align text within a paragraph
options.d: To align text in a navigation menu

title: What is 'align-self' used for in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align elements with their parents
options.b: To control the alignment of a specific flex item along the cross axis
options.c: To align elements with the center of the page
options.d: To align elements with other elements

title: What is 'flex-grow' in CSS Flex?

options.a: A type of plant growth
options.b: A property that specifies how much a flex item should grow relative to other flex items
options.c: A property for animating images
options.d: A property for changing text size

title: What does 'flex-shrink' control in CSS Flex?

options.a: The shrinkage of fabric
options.b: A property that specifies how much a flex item should shrink relative to other flex items
options.c: The shrinkage of images

title: What is 'flex-basis' in CSS Flex?

options.a: A type of flexible foundation
options.b: A property that specifies the initial size of a flex item before it is placed into a flex container
options.c: A property for setting the basis of web design
options.d: A property for setting the basis of a book

title: What is 'flex' shorthand for in CSS Flex?

options.a: A type of flexible candy
options.b: A shorthand property for setting 'flex-grow', 'flex-shrink', and 'flex-basis' in one declaration
options.c: A type of flexible material

title: What is 'order' used for in CSS Flex?

options.a: To rearrange the elements of a website
options.b: To control the order in which flex items appear within a flex container
options.c: To order food online

title: What does 'flex-wrap' control in CSS Flex?

options.a: The wrapping of gifts
options.b: A property that specifies whether flex items should wrap onto a new line when they overflow the container
options.c: The wrapping of text

title: What is the purpose of 'align-content' in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align a website with a grid
options.b: To align multiple lines of flex items when there is extra space in the cross axis
options.c: To align images with text

title: What is the 'flexbox' layout model also known as?

options.a: The 'float' layout model
options.b: The 'grid' layout model
options.c: The 'block' layout model

title: What is a 'flex basis' value of 'auto' in CSS Flex?

options.a: It means the item has no basis
options.b: It means the item should take up all available space
options.c: It means the item's basis is automatically determined based on its content
options.d: It means the item has a fixed basis

title: What does 'flex-flow' shorthand property do in CSS Flex?

options.a: It controls the flow of water in a website design
options.b: It combines 'flex-direction' and 'flex-wrap' properties in one declaration
options.c: It controls the flow of air in a room
options.d: It controls the flow of electricity in a circuit

title: What is 'align-self' used for in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align the self with others
options.b: To control the alignment of a specific flex item within a flex container
options.c: To align the self with the world
options.d: To align the self with the universe

title: What is 'flex-wrap' shorthand property in CSS Flex?

options.a: A property for wrapping gifts
options.b: A shorthand property that combines 'flex-wrap' and 'flex-direction'
options.c: A property for wrapping text

title: What is 'flex-grow' shorthand property in CSS Flex?

options.a: A property for growing plants
options.b: A shorthand property that combines 'flex-grow' and 'flex-shrink'
options.c: A property for growing businesses

title: What is 'flex' shorthand property used for in CSS Flex?

options.a: A shorthand for flexible clothing
options.b: A shorthand property for setting 'flex-grow', 'flex-shrink', and 'flex-basis' in one declaration
options.c: A shorthand for flexible art

title: What is 'order' shorthand property in CSS Flex?

options.a: A property for reordering a website
options.b: A shorthand property for controlling the order of flex items
options.c: A property for ordering food online

title: What is the purpose of 'align-content' shorthand property in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align the content of a website with a grid
options.b: A shorthand property for aligning multiple lines of flex items when there is extra space in the cross axis
options.c: To align content with a specific font

title: What is the default value of 'flex-wrap' in CSS Flex?

options.a: nowrap
options.b: wrap
options.c: wrap-reverse

title: What does 'flex-flow' shorthand property combine in CSS Flex?

options.a: It combines water and air flow
options.b: It combines 'flex-direction' and 'flex-wrap' properties
options.c: It combines different flow patterns in a design
options.d: It combines different flow styles in a room

title: What is 'align-self' shorthand property used for in CSS Flex?

options.a: To align the self with the future
options.b: A shorthand property for controlling the alignment of a specific flex item within a flex container
options.c: To align the self with a specific element
options.d: To align the self with a mirror
